name: Build it up: Epic Arcade Fun
name_original: Build it up: Epic Arcade Fun
description:
Hey-ho, hey-ho, it's it's time to sling, duck, and shuffle
Topple your tallest tower record. Test your timing, tempo and skills, and dodge death as you swoosh and switch sides with your builder buddies.
Stack ‘em high, crouch down low, and don't forget: it takes two to tango. BUILD IT UP.
